name: lax.js

scripts.build: babel src -d lib && uglifyjs lib/lax.js -o lib/lax.min.js -c -m && gzip -c lib/lax.min.js > lib/lax.min.js.gz && cp lib/lax.min.js docs/lib/lax.min.js && npm run types

description: Simple & lightweight (<4kb gzipped) vanilla JavaScript library to create smooth & beautiful animations when you scroll.
author: alexfoxy@gmail.com
